text: Niveotectura is a genus of sea snails, the true limpets, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Lottiidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Niveotectura include: * Niveotectura funiculata (Carpenter, 1864) * Niveotectura pallida (Gould, 1859) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Lottiidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Niveotectura
